title: Write an Android application
desc: Hi, I need a very simple application, it will be a quiz application, neatly developed with very simple graphics. It will be an MCQs type application, users will be allowed to choose an answer from multiple options. Application will prompt for right answer. Would be great if there is some sort of grading. You can use open source codes / templates but no copyright infringements. Few basic things i need in application are below:- Primarily need it for Android Store but appreciate to see cross platform proposals- Splash screen (need no special graphics, just display any template logo)- Admob integration required- Easy to edit (for example if i want to add more / edit questions, it should be a piece of cake for my self either through source code or interface or any other option)- Social Media Sharing (users should be able to share about application on social media(s) for example faceboook, watsapp etc)- Don't want fancy buttons or special graphics, keep it very simple, just use peaceful colors like blue/green.Will appreciate if you let me know about development technologies you are planning to use and its benefits. Also let me know if you've done a similar project. Furthermore i'll be considering prices and quality as well, but major focus will be on prices.There is no special restriction regarding time, i'm in no hurry. Hoping for long term coordination. Thanks

You are required to change this to work with your own server.- Steps seems to be simple:1) Modify Google's Default cloud print source to redirect to our own server page ( [url removed, login to view] ) if not logged in then login screen is shown and then re-directed to [url removed, login to view] page after successful login.2) In this page basically seems to be 2 place you can upload the file to using HTTP POST.  They are named as "Printer 1" , "Printer 2", etc.. But actually are destinations to [url removed, login to view],  Printer2_UploadFile.php.That seems to be it.If you can do it, send me a PM.Thanks for lookingNo time wasters please. Show me the demo video of working app and I will pay instant.

title: GameDay Parking
desc: I currently have an app that is live on the App Store called GameDay Parking which is pre-beta but needs a few tweaks before I can market it to get more beta users: I am mostly happy with the app but need three key features added to the app (which was written in Xcode by the original developer).1. The current search function requires users to search by city- I want the app to be able to show current parking spaces that are available by scrolling with their finger on the map and having the app update the available spaces (if too many spaces in the given map area simply a notification that the search area needs to be redefined.2. The admin panel on the backend needs to be corrected so that after the user has paid and host has entered payment details that the administratyr can pay the host his booking fee via the two payment portals (currently apple pay with stripe or PayPal.3. Currently if a host lists a spot for $15 the user pays $15 and after processing fees and Gameday fees (10%) the host would end up receiving a payment of $12. I want the Gameday fees and the processing fees to be borne by the user booking the space (so a $15 space ends up costing the host $18 all in.Please download the app and understand what the work requires before submitting a bid. I am hoping to have this done in the next week. Please highlight any potential issues that there may be and if you would prefer to work hourly I am open to that as well. I will not read generic bids.

title: Build Conditional SMS Bot/Twilio Integration + User Profile and Real Time Leaderboard
desc: Conditional SMS bot, with User Profiles, Leaderboard viewable through Mobile browsers.I have an MVP that does not work:*Twilio-Typeform* integration- SMS reminders and check ins based on typeform input for each day of the week, two originating texts based on typeform inputted time- 1 hour before inputted time- 2 hours after inputted time- world timezone support- *Conditional responses* based on user responses to text- Random response generator based on response templates (for example: in response to a "no" - bot chooses randomly from 8 template responses)- user responses are equal to points- Individual *user profile* showing daily points and current point total (with graphic)-  *Leaderboard* comparing current users showing daily points and weekly points- looks good on mobile (main access point)----A conditional SMS bot. I have a dysfunctional MVP working, it connects from typeform and goes through Twilio. Users plan the week get SMS reminders and check-ins for their plan and responds based on their responses daily. It is time sensitive, time zone sensitive, and answer sensitive.Additionally, a leaderboard connected to the responses which are equal to points and needs to be updated in real-time, and a basic user profile that tracks their daily answers, and points. There is an MVP up for the leaderboard as well, but it is buggy. For the moment this needs to be optimized for mobile, but I also want the system/design to be flexible enough for desktops, so the system can be used for email as well.

title: Full design and build of new breathing/wellness mobile app
desc: I need an iPhone/iPad app. I would like it designed and built.  This will be a Qi Gong breathing and visualization app. I need an 3D image of a body that shows specific meridians based on a chosen season. 5 separate seasons. A yin meridian and a yang meridian.  I would like a specific color to move along the meridian along with our specifically designed training music.  It is based on 4 second timing.  So inhale would flow up the line say with blue for 4 sec and line would flow down with exhale say with yellow.  The speed of the line would be able to slow down according to desired inhale and exhale.  If you wanted 8 second breath music stays same but line slows down.  This is bare bones of what this app can do so room for expansion is desired.  This is my first post so bare with me.
